title: Earth, Wind & Fire
summary: Earth, Wind & Fire (EW&F or EWF) is an American band that has spanned the musical genres of R&B, soul, funk, jazz, disco, pop, dance, Latin, and Afro pop.[2][3] They have been described as one of the most innovative and are among the most commercially successful acts of all time.[2][4][5] With sales of over 90Â million records, they are one of the world's best-selling bands of all time.[6][7][8]
